title: Purple Candies
question_text:
A company published its percentages for colors of candy included in its jumbo packs. Here they are:
redorangeyellowgreenbluepurple
$0.10$$0.30$$0.25$$0.05$$0.15$$0.15$
A firm was hired to perform a chi-square goodness of fit test. What is the alternative hypothesis and what is the expected number of purple candies given there were $40$ bags randomly selected which included $960$ total candies sampled?

6
